</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="in-运算符">in 运算符<a class="anchor-link" href="#in-运算符">¶</a></h2><p>迭代通常是隐式的，如果集合中没有 <strong><code>__contains__</code></strong>　方法， in 操作符就会按顺序进行一次迭代搜索，于是 in 可以在 FrenchDeck 类中使用，因为它是可迭代的</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [37]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">Card</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Q'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'hearts'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">deck</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[37]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>True</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [38]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">Card</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Q'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'beasts'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">deck</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[38]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>False</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="排序">排序<a class="anchor-link" href="#排序">¶</a></h2><p>扑克牌一般按照数字大小（ Ａ 最大）来排列，花色按照黑桃（最大），红心，方块，梅花（最小）来排序，我们实现一下此功能</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [39]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">suit_values</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">spades</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hearts</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">diamonds</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">clubs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">suit_values</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[39]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>{'clubs': 0, 'diamonds': 1, 'hearts': 2, 'spades': 3}</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [44]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">spades_high</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">card</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">rank_value</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">FrenchDeck</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ranks</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">card</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rank</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">rank_value</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">suit_values</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">suit_values</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">card</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">suit</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [45]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">card</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">sorted</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">deck</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">spades_high</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">card</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Card(rank='2', suit='clubs')
Card(rank='2', suit='diamonds')
Card(rank='2', suit='hearts')
Card(rank='2', suit='spades')

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>现在还无法洗牌，因为牌的顺序是不可变的，除非我们破坏这个类的封装性，直接对 <code>_cards</code> 进行操作，在以后我们会讲到，其实只需要一行代码实现 <code>__setitem__</code> 方法就可以了</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
